My name's Stephen Mariano. I go by Stephen in North America and Mariano in South America. Take your pick.

I'm an American expat and web developer living in Lima, Peru. I love writing, learning and building things. Right now I'm building things with Ruby. I hope to use this site to share some of that love. Here you can find blog posts, links to my online presence (on the left), and links to my projects and their source code.

You can download a current copy of my CV/Résumé here
